locations: West Los Angeles, Los Angeles, California, USA
imdb.plot outline: A father (Tom Fahn) does everything he can to get his 9 year old daughter to come out of the bathroom on a Saturday afternoon so he can get back to watch the end of the Dodger game on TV. This is the debut episode of the new slice of life web series where father thinks he knows best.
imdb.title: Fun Dad
plot: A father (Tom Fahn) does everything he can to get his 9 year old daughter to come out of the bathroom on a Saturday afternoon so he can get back to watch the end of the Dodger game on TV. This is the debut episode of the new slice of life web series where father thinks he knows best.::Tom Fahn
